title: Need more flexibility with spacing
name: Ishan S.M.
review: Excellent Application! Only issue I faced was that I could not use page breaks or spacing to my convenience. Some places I'd prefer if one section did not spill over to the other page, which makes it harder to read. It would be great if we had more flexibility to choose the spacing and gaps between each section.
